009package imagingbook.common.edgepreservingfilters;
010
011import imagingbook.common.image.access.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
012import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
013
014public interface KuwaharaF {
015
016        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
017                
018                /** Radius of the filter (should be even) */
019                @DialogLabel("Radius of the filter (>1)")
020                public int radius = 2;
021                
022                /** Threshold on sigma to avoid banding in flat regions */
023                @DialogLabel("Variance threshold 0,..,10")
024                public double tsigma = 5.0;
025                
026                @DialogLabel("Out-of-bounds strategy")
027                public OutOfBoundsStrategy obs = OutOfBoundsStrategy.NearestBorder;
028        }
029
030}
